description.en:
Having been married for three years, she didn’t know who her husband was. An accidental blind date brought more troubles than she had imagined... The man became her boss the next day, and he seemed to be interested in her and wouldn't let her go!

---
She’s been married for three years, yet she doesn’t know who her husband is. During an unexpected blind date, she got to know Long Zehuan, a super-rich CEO! The man leans in and asks in a low voice, “What do you call me?"

“Hub… Hubby?"

“Wrong!” The next day she wakes up in anger: What does it feel like to marry a man who enjoys role-playing?

---
[Original Web Comic](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/645969)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [INKR](https://inkr.com/title/474), [WebComic](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5e9d47e68c252b34384fc025), [WeComics](https://wecomics.com/comic/index/id/1090?id=1090)
* [Korean / 한국어](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/im_married_sir)
description.ko:
결혼한지 3년, 아직 남편의 얼굴도 모르는 채 살고 있는 주인공 권지안, 
친구의 부탁에 소개팅을 나가게 되고 거기서 자신의 정체를 알고 있는 남자를 만나게 되는데, 다음날 그 남자가 회사 대표님으로 주인공 앞에 나타나게 된다.

---
